exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Classic bodyweight exercise targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps. Start in plank position and lower body to ground.
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulders
Lower your body until chest nearly touches the floor
Push back up to starting position
Keep your body in a straight line throughout

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Fundamental lower body exercise targeting quads, glutes, and hamstrings.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower your body as if sitting back into a chair
Keep chest up and knees tracking over toes
Return to standing position

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Upper body pulling exercise targeting lats, biceps, and rear deltoids.
instructions: Hang from pull-up bar with palms facing away
Pull your body up until chin clears the bar
Lower yourself with control
Keep core engaged throughout

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: Compound movement targeting posterior chain muscles including hamstrings, glutes, and back.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot
Hinge at hips and bend knees to grip bar
Drive through heels and extend hips to lift bar
Keep bar close to body throughout movement

exercises.name: Planks
exercises.description: Isometric core exercise that builds stability and strength in the entire core region.
instructions: Start in push-up position on forearms
Keep body in straight line from head to heels
Engage core and breathe normally
Hold position for specified time

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Classic upper body pressing exercise for building chest, shoulder, and tricep strength.
instructions: Lie on bench with feet flat on floor
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Lower bar to chest with control
Press bar back to starting position

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Isolation exercise specifically targeting the bicep muscles of the upper arm.
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing forward
Curl weights up by flexing biceps
Squeeze at the top of the movement
Lower with control to starting position

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Unilateral lower body exercise that targets quads, glutes, and improves balance.
instructions: Step forward with one leg into lunge position
Lower hips until both knees are at 90 degrees
Push back to starting position
Alternate legs or complete all reps on one side

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Overhead pressing movement that targets shoulder muscles and triceps.
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at shoulder height
Press weights overhead until arms are extended
Lower with control back to shoulder height
Keep core engaged throughout

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Bodyweight exercise targeting triceps using a chair, bench, or parallel bars.
instructions: Sit on edge of chair with hands gripping edge
Slide forward and lower body by bending elbows
Push back up to starting position
Keep elbows close to body

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Rotational core exercise that targets obliques and builds rotational strength.
instructions: Sit with knees bent, feet slightly off ground
Lean back slightly and engage core
Rotate torso side to side
Touch ground on each side of hips

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Simple exercise targeting the calf muscles of the lower leg.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Rise up onto balls of feet
Hold briefly at the top
Lower slowly back to starting position

additional_exercises.name: Bent-Over Rows
additional_exercises.description: Compound pulling exercise targeting the entire back musculature and biceps.
instructions: Hold barbell with overhand grip, feet hip-width apart
Hinge at hips, keep back straight and core engaged
Pull bar to lower chest/upper abdomen
Squeeze shoulder blades together at top
Lower with control to starting position

additional_exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
additional_exercises.description: Dynamic cardio exercise that targets core while providing cardiovascular benefits.
instructions: Start in plank position with hands under shoulders
Bring right knee toward chest
Quickly switch legs, bringing left knee to chest
Continue alternating legs in running motion
Keep hips level and core engaged

additional_exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
additional_exercises.description: Isolation exercise specifically targeting the tricep muscles with overhead movement.
instructions: Hold one dumbbell with both hands overhead
Keep upper arms stationary and elbows close to head
Lower weight behind head by bending elbows
Extend elbows to return to starting position
Focus on squeezing triceps at the top

additional_exercises.name: Glute Bridges
additional_exercises.description: Isolation exercise targeting glutes and hamstrings while strengthening the posterior chain.
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent, feet flat on floor
Squeeze glutes and push hips up toward ceiling
Create straight line from knees to shoulders
Hold briefly at top, squeezing glutes
Lower hips back to starting position

additional_exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
additional_exercises.description: Seated pulling exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi and upper back muscles.
instructions: Sit at lat pulldown machine with thighs secured
Grip bar wider than shoulder width
Pull bar down to upper chest while leaning back slightly
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Slowly return bar to starting position

additional_exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
additional_exercises.description: Unilateral leg exercise that challenges balance while targeting the entire leg musculature.
instructions: Stand 2-3 feet in front of bench or chair
Place top of rear foot on bench behind you
Lower into lunge position on front leg
Push through front heel to return to starting position
Complete all reps before switching legs

additional_exercises.name: Face Pulls
additional_exercises.description: Pulling exercise that targets rear deltoids and upper back, great for posture improvement.
instructions: Attach resistance band at chest height
Hold handles with arms extended forward
Pull handles toward face, elbows high
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Slowly return to starting position

additional_exercises.name: Wall Sits
additional_exercises.description: Isometric exercise that builds endurance and strength in the quadriceps and glutes.
instructions: Stand with back against wall, feet shoulder-width apart
Slide down wall until thighs parallel to floor
Keep knees at 90-degree angle
Hold position while breathing normally
Focus on keeping weight in heels
